nodes.text: Shanra Immel's squad was a Galactic Republic military squad under the command of Republic trooper Sergeant Shanra Immel. In 3640 BBY Immel's squad was deployed on the planet Kalandis Seven when the Reconstituted Sith Empire invaded and occupied the planet. Republic Special Forces Division Colonel Jace Malcom was assigned as an advisor to the squad. During the battle the squad was tasked with the destruction of the local spaceport. Corporal Amden vor Keioidian was fatally wounded during the squad's trek to the spaceport. Ultimately the rest of the squad was successful in the spaceport's destruction.

Shanra Immel's squad was a part of the Galactic Republic's military and was under the command of Sergeant Shanra Immel. Known members of the squad include Camur, Eron, Yennir of the Green, Vaskus Kayle, Amden vor Keioidian, Min-Reva, and Zenhai. SpecForce Colonel Jace Malcom personally hand-picked a few squad members specifically for their mission to destroy Kalandis Seven's spaceport.

In 3640 BBY Immel's squad was deployed on the planet Kalandis Seven when the Reconstituted Sith Empire invaded and occupied the planet. SpecForce Colonel Jace Malcom was assigned as an advisor to the squad. During the battle the squad was tasked with the destruction of the local spaceport. Corporal Amden vor Keioidian was fatally wounded during the squad's trek to the spaceport. Ultimately the rest of the squad was successful in the spaceport's destruction.

Shanra Immel's squad was first mentioned within Pablo Hidalgo's reference book The Essential Reader's Companion which was released on October 2, 2012. The squad first appeared within Alexander Freed's short story The Last Battle of Colonel Jace Malcom which was published within Star Wars Insider 137 and released on October 23, 2012.
